name: Whiriling dancers
description: The whirling dervishes perform a Sufi dance, steered by rhythmic breathing as they seek to become one with God. Their white robes rise and fall in unison, spinning faster and faster. The right palm is raised to the heavens to receive Godâ€™s blessings, which are communicated to earth by the left hand pointing to the ground. I took this photo in Konya,Turkey.
